Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.name: NPIGenericError
Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.abstract: Generic error that may occur in the following cases

Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.name: NPITerminalValidationError
Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.abstract: Terminal Validation Error. May occur in the following cases:

Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.name: NPIRequestFailed
Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.abstract: Regular iOS network error. May occur in the following cases:

Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.name: NPIWalletAppNotInstalled
Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.abstract: The wallet app is not installed on the device.

Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.name: NPIWalletURLInvalid
Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.abstract: The wallet URL returned from payment registration with BE is invalid.

Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.name: NPIWalletRedirectURLUnknown
Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.abstract: The redirect url (passed from UIApplication open:url) is unknown and could not be parsed.

Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.name: NPIVippsErrorStatusCode
Type Definitions/NPIErrorCode/.html#/c:@.abstract: Vipps payment failure with Vipps status code parsed from redirect URL

Type Definitions.html#/c:PiaSDK.h@T@Vipp.name: VippsStatusCode
Type Definitions.html#/c:PiaSDK.h@T@Vipp.abstract: Vipps status codes. Can be found on Vipps documentation.

Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -registerVippsPayment:
Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: Register Vipps payment with merchant backend. Callback with wallet URL

Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -vippsPaymentDidFailWith:vippsStatusCode:
Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: Vipps payment failed with internal or Vipps error status.

Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -vippsDidRedirectWith:
Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: (Optional) Returns the parsed raw status code from Vipps redirect.

Protocols/WalletPaymentDelegate.html#/c:.name: -walletPaymentDidSucceed:
Protocols/WalletPaymentDelegate.html#/c:.abstract: The wallet payment was successful. Commit the payment to finalize purchase.

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -doInitialAPICall:storeCard:withCompletion:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: Before the actual payment, the app should register the payment in it’s own backend. This method will get called when the sdk needs the app to do that.

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -registerPaymentWithApplePayData:paymentData:newShippingContact:withCompletion:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: Unlike the normal card payment, you should register the payment with this Apple Pay payment data. This method will be called if the payment method is Apple Pay

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -registerPaymentWithPayPal:withCompletion:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: This method will get called if the chosen payment type will be PayPal.

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -PiaSDK:didFailWithError:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: Will get called if, for whatever reason, the payment process fails. Check the error code to see what went wrong (both saving card and payment).

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -PiaSDKDidCompleteWithSuccess:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: Will get called if payment process goes well.

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -PiaSDKDidCompleteSaveCardWithSuccess:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: Will get called if saving card process goes well.

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -PiaSDKDidCancel:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: Will get called if user decides to cancel the process (both saving card and payment)

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.name: -PiaSDK:didChangeApplePayShippingContact:withCompletion:
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl.abstract: Will get called if user decides to change the shipping contact inside Apple Pay process

Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html.name: PiaSDKDelegate
Protocols/PiaSDKDelegate.html.abstract: The PiaSDK protocol provides a mechanism for your application to take

Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html.name: VippsPaymentDelegate
Protocols/VippsPaymentDelegate.html.abstract: Vipps payment delegate is used by the SDK throughout Vipps payment process;

Enums/SchemeType.html#/c:@E@SchemeType@D.name: DANKORT

Enums/SchemeType.html.name: SchemeType
Enums/SchemeType.html.abstract: Enumeration of all the supported card schemes.

Enums/PiALanguage.html.name: PiALanguage
Enums/PiALanguage.html.abstract: List of supported languages within PiA SDK

Constants.html#/c:@NPIPiaSemanticVersion.name: NPIPiaSemanticVersionString
Constants.html#/c:@NPIPiaSemanticVersion.abstract: Semantic version string for Pia. The same with the CFBundleShortVersionString entry found in the Info.plist file. Ignore the Apple provided versioning constants above.

Constants.html#/c:@NPIPiaTechnicalVersio.name: NPIPiaTechnicalVersionString
Constants.html#/c:@NPIPiaTechnicalVersio.abstract: Technical version string for Pia. Please provide this information when reporting any issues.

Classes/PiaSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)PiaSDK(cm.abstract: Attempts to initiate Vipps payment and returns true if sucessful.

Classes/PiaSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)PiaSDK(cm.abstract: Notify SDK app is opened from wallet app redirect.

Classes/NPIError.html#/c:objc(cs)NPIErro.name: localizedDescription
Classes/NPIError.html#/c:objc(cs)NPIErro.abstract: Technical error message which should not be presented directly to customers

Classes/NPITokenCardInfo.html#/c:objc(cs.name: systemAuthenticationRequired
Classes/NPITokenCardInfo.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Whether or not system authentication is needed

Classes/NPIApplePayShippingInfo.html#/c:.name: shippingAddress
Classes/NPIApplePayShippingInfo.html#/c:.abstract: The buyer’s full street address, including name, street, city, state or province, postal code, and country

Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: currencyCode
Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Currency Code to be used for Apple Pay Info , NOTE: your supported currency code with Netaxept

Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: applePayItemDisplayName
Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The name of item will be displayed in Apple Pay view

Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: applePayMerchantDisplayName

Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: applePayItemCost

Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).name: applePayItemShippingCost

Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The payment networks supported by the merchant

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: barColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all navigation bars.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: barTitleColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all navigation bars titles.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: barItemsColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all navigation bars action items.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: backgroundColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all UIViews that don’t fit in any of the special casses below (navBar, label, field, switch, etc).

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: buttonFont
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Font to be used for all buttons in the SDK. The point size will be overwritten, just the font name/familly will be used.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: buttonTextColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Title color to be used for all the buttons in the SDK for the default state.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: mainButtonBackgroundColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Title color to be used for all the buttons in the SDK for the default state.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: switchThumbColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color for the switch thumbs.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: switchOnTintColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color for the switch color when switch is on.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: switchOffTintColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color for the switch color when switch is off.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: fieldTextColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used in all fields/textviews in the SDK.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: fieldFont
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Font to be used for all fields/textviews. The point size will be overwritten, just the font name/familly will be used.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: labelTextColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all the labels in the SDK.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: errorFieldColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used in the error messages, border color of error text field and color of attention button on the text field.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: successFieldColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used in the successful validation case of card entry view.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: tokenCardCVCViewBackgroundColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used in CVC entry for Subsequent transaction view.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: labelFont
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Font to be used in the SDK for all labels. The point size will be overwritten, just the font name/familly will be used.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: logoImage
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Logo image to be displayed in the card form screen. Width equal to the screen, height = 70.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: saveCardOn
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Wheather or not the save card switch should be on by default.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: cardIOBackgroundColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for Card IO’s background.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: cardIOButtonTextColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for Card IO’s Entry card manually button text.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: cardIOButtonTextFont
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Font to be used for Card IO’s Entry card manually button font.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: cardIOButtonBackgroundColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for Card IO’s Entry card manually button background color.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: cardIOPreviewFrameColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for Card IO preview frame.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: cardIOTextColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all the texts inside Card IO view.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: cardIOTextFont
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Font to be used in the Card IO view for all labels. The point size will be overwritten, just the font name/familly will be used.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: disableCardIO
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Choose whether to disable CardIO/Card scanner or not

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: statusBarColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all view’s status bar

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: useStatusBarLightContent
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Use either light or dark content for status bar

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: logoImageContentMode
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Content view mode for logo image

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: disableSaveCardOption
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Choose whether to disable save card for later user option

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: fieldBackgroundColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all text entry background

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: language
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Supported language to use within PiA SDK

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: textFieldPlaceholderColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Color to be used for all text field place holder text

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: attributedSaveCardText
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Text to be used for save card Label

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: activeFieldBorderColor
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Border color for active text field.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: buttonLeftMargin
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Left margin for all buttons used in the SDK.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: buttonRightMargin
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Right margin for all buttons used in the SDK.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: buttonBottomMargin
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Bottom margin for all buttons used in the SDK.

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: textFieldCornerRadius
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Rounding corners for all text fields of the SDK, value ranges from 0.0 - 0.5 (0.5 suggest full rounded corners).

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.name: buttonCornerRadius
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Rounding corners for all buttons of the SDK, value ranges from 0.0 - 0.5 (0.5 suggest full rounded corners).

Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html.name: NPIInterfaceConfiguration
Classes/NPIInterfaceConfiguration.html.abstract: @NSObject NSObject that provides UI Customisation API

Classes/PiaSDKController.html.name: PiaSDKController
Classes/PiaSDKController.html.abstract: @class Controller that handles both payment and saving card process

Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html.name: NPIApplePayInfo
Classes/NPIApplePayInfo.html.abstract: Class used to encapsulate Apple Pay information

Classes/NPIApplePayShippingInfo.html.name: NPIApplePayShippingInfo
Classes/NPIApplePayShippingInfo.html.abstract: Class used to encapsulate Apple Pay Shipping Infomation

Classes/NPITokenCardInfo.html.name: NPITokenCardInfo
Classes/NPITokenCardInfo.html.abstract: NPITokenCardInfo describes a tokenized card - one that the user previously saved.

Classes/NPIError.html.name: NPIError
Classes/NPIError.html.abstract: Class that encapsulates information about an error condition.

Classes/NPITransactionInfo.html.name: NPITransactionInfo
Classes/NPITransactionInfo.html.abstract: Class that encapsulates transaction data. Used to pass registration information around.

Type Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
